attributes.action: Ban the march in Wootton Bassett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Islam4UK has said it would apply to police for permission to protest in the Wiltshire town of Wootton Bassett famous for honouring repatriated British troops.
The march would consist of dozens of symbolic coffins representing Afghan civilians killed in the conflict. This will and has caused widespread public anger. We call upon the Government to ban this group and the proposed march.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
